MechaMan Smart Glove.name: MechaMan Smart Glove
MechaMan Smart Glove.description:
A biking glove that comes with a subdermal grip pre-installed* which requires a neural link to use. Has 1 additional cyberarm option slot. Any options stored in the Cyberhand or meat hand are inaccessible while the Smart Glove is being worn.
*Subdermal Grip must be added and installed manually after acquiring the glove, this effectively consumes one of the option slots.

ChipVault by SecSystems.name: ChipVault by SecSystems
ChipVault by SecSystems.description: Can hold up to 8 pieces of Chipware. Chipware stored inside are immune to EMP effects.

CO2 Tank.name: CO2 Tank
CO2 Tank.description: A CO2 tank designed for usage with the Masetto AirRider armor. Must be replaced after every usage.

Drink Master 3000.name: Drink Master 3000
Drink Master 3000.description: Can make 10 beverages out of a 3000 beverages library before needing to be refilled. Can also make Smash.

EL-F4-NT Linear Frame.name: EL-F4-NT Linear Frame
EL-F4-NT Linear Frame.description:
Exoskeleton.

  • Increases BODY to 12 while equipped
  • Does not affect HP or Deathsave
  • Has pre-installed pair of Techtools

Everest VentureWare AirWell 50.name: Everest VentureWare AirWell 50
Everest VentureWare AirWell 50.description: Produces enough water to sustain a person.

Everest VentureWare One Touch Habitat.name: Everest VentureWare One Touch Habitat
Everest VentureWare One Touch Habitat.description: Provides protection from Exposure. Counts as Sleeping in the Wilderness or as Sleeping on the Streets.

Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame.name: Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame
Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame.description:
Exoskeleton.

  • Requires 2 Interface Plugs
  • Increases BODY to 12 while plugged in
  • Does not affect HP or Deathsave
  • Stealth +2
  • Drawing and sheathing the frame's weapons does not require an Action
  • A Conceal check is not required for the weapons concealed in the frame.

  • Frame has one of two weapon options*:

    • Two excellent quality exotic heavy melee weapons
    • One excellent quality light melee weapon and one excellent quality exotic very heavy melee weapon

* Must be manually added.

Hydrosubsidium Universal Aqualung.name: Hydrosubsidium Universal Aqualung
Hydrosubsidium Universal Aqualung.description: When worn, User can breathe underwater as long as within 10 m/yards of the surface.

Jeeves Executive Garment Bag.name: Jeeves Executive Garment Bag
Jeeves Executive Garment Bag.description: Bag that can repair one piece of fashion or armor at a time.

KillStrom Banshee Microphone.name: KillStrom Banshee Microphone
KillStrom Banshee Microphone.description: Wireless Microphone Headset. Gives the User a +2 bonus to Play Instrument (Singing) Skill Checks while worn. Doesn't stack with other bonuses to Play Instrument.

KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp.name: KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp
KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp.description: While linked to an instrument, the User can take an Action to make everyone nearby make a Resist Torture/Drugs Check.

KillStrom Typhoid Speaker.name: KillStrom Typhoid Speaker
KillStrom Typhoid Speaker.description: When linked to a KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp, increases the DV of the Resist Torture/Drugs Check.

KTech Doberman 500.name: KTech Doberman 500
KTech Doberman 500.description: Canine Personal Drone that can be linked to an Agent.

Laser Light Electric Guitar.name: Laser Light Electric Guitar
Laser Light Electric Guitar.description: Electric Guitar that gives the User a +1 to their Play Instrument (Guitar) Skill Check. This guitar also counts as one installation of Light Tattoo Fashionware while worn.

LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame.name: LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame
LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame.description:
Exoskeleton.

  • Requires 2 Interface Plugs
  • Increases BODY to 12 while plugged in
  • Does not affect HP or Deathsave
  • Ignores the normal movement penalty for climbing and swimming

Mr. Biscuit Multi-Food Processor.name: Mr. Biscuit Multi-Food Processor
Mr. Biscuit Multi-Food Processor.description: Can sustain a group of up to 10 people when in the Outskirts.

Petrochem Nitro Ultra9.name: Petrochem Nitro Ultra9
Petrochem Nitro Ultra9.description: Can be poured into a Vehicle's tank to refill it as an Action. Gives bonuses to movement at the expense of safety.

RapiDeploy Sheath.name: RapiDeploy Sheath
RapiDeploy Sheath.description: Gives the User a +2 bonus to their Conceal/Reveal Skill Check if used to conceal a weapon already capable of concealment.

Shower•in•a•Can.name: Shower•in•a•Can
Shower•in•a•Can.description: Spray Deodorant. Desinfects and deodorize. One use per can.

Streetcase by SecSystems.name: Streetcase by SecSystems
Streetcase by SecSystems.description: Can carry many easily accessible items that YOU need to stay safe.

Vermilion Linear Frame.name: Vermilion Linear Frame
Vermilion Linear Frame.description:
Exoskeleton.

  • Requires 2 Interface Plugs
  • Increases BODY to 12 while plugged in
  • No changes to your HP or Deathsave
  • No movement penalty for jumping
  • Operates as if paired Skate Feet are installed

WorldSat Aerial Sphere.name: WorldSat Aerial Sphere
WorldSat Aerial Sphere.description: When set up, provides access to a Citinet when within 50 miles of the city or of another set up WorldSat Aerial Sphere that is connected to the Citinet.

Zetatech Porta-Printer.name: Zetatech Porta-Printer
Zetatech Porta-Printer.description: Miniature Workshop. Allows a Tech to use Upgrade and Fabrication Experstise anywhere as long as they have techtools.
